Author: dejligrosa
Text: This was me for 1.5-2y – restricted to a similar amount, exercised 3h+ a day. I lost my period but felt a-okay. The past few months I’ve crashed; gained 10 on 1500-1700 calories, had to cut my exercise in half, extreme hunger and that shit. Now I’ve got severe osteoporosis and struggle with hypoglycemia. You probably won’t be fine unfortunately.
